title: justinlamode
author: justinlamode
content: I joined cryptocurrency in 2021 based on recommendation from a friend. Since then, I focused mainly on trading in exchanges. By this I mean, buying in exchange and holding till price rises and I sell for a profit. I wouldn't say it was a bad experience entirely but it is a slow process that tests patience, wisdom and greed. Nevertheless, I believe there should be more ways one can find opportunities of making money from blockchain technology in general; this is the reason for this thread. Kindly, give recommendations as to how one or what one can do to make income (passive or active) from cryptocurrency and blockchain technology.

comments.author: Onset
comments.body: There’s so much more to it than just how much money you can make. If you stop looking for the money and start looking at the actual changes it made to society and finance, you’ll understand so much faster why and how Bitcoin is the future.Opportunities are many. You get free banking with no contracts and restrictions in countries where unbanked are many. There’s nobody you have to ask for permission to send money to somebody else. You send it whenever to whoever you want. You can set up a Bitcoin payment system for your business and stop accepting the commissions banks take for transactions your customers make. Or you can just invest in Bitcoin and be part of the future. But again, the spectrum of opportunities is so much wider than you think.Understand Bitcoin and use all the opportunities you see around. By taking these opportunities, money will come to you naturally. By earning the % you used to lose through bank POS contracts, by inviting Bitcoin enthusiasts to your business, by purchasing amounts of Bitcoin that become twice as hard to mine every four years and much more.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Quote from: justinlamode on May 16, 2023, 10:54:34 AMNevertheless, I believe there should be more ways one can find opportunities of making money from blockchain technology in general; this is the reason for this thread. Kindly, give recommendations as to how one or what one can do to make income (passive or active) from cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Trading is one of the ways to earn from cryptocurrency. Another way again is integrating its payment method into your business, this will allow you to earn some income as the price increases but the risky of losing is also there. If you want to earn from blockchain then you need to be a developer or kind of software engineers, there companies that employ people with the coding skills and since the whole thing isn’t that rampant there is opportunities still much available in this space. You can also be a cryptocurrency or rather bitcoin miner and engage in the mining process. All of these things needs funding and knowledge, for someone who doesn’t have any basic knowledge you need to seek one first. The only way to earn cryptocurrency for free is through the internet faucets where you get paid in coins for performing some tasks, but this also doesn’t generate any significant income again

comments.body: To highly explore aspect of crypto-currency that doesn't require you to invest, then you should have a degree of technicality, Crypto-currency sure do offer opportunities but you must know it's highly competitive. An example is Bitcoin mining, this aspect used to be very simple with lesser competition than now and then you could even use your phone to mine, right now that aspect is very competitive and also you need heavy devices (software and hardware) that requires high amount of powers to function.There are still many other aspect you can look into but I advice you start simple, investment has been the most famous opportunity that crypto-currency has to offer and it's been profitable but there are risky also attached to it. You can learn web designing and you can help projects create website or build a trading app but one thing is certain you should find a skill you good in.

comments.author: Luffygroove
comments.body: Trading is just a small part of how you can earn money from crypto. Earning from crypto requires skills and knowledge. That is what you need to increase in order to gain money in the industry. Well, let me try to explain what source of money I know from cryptocurrency.1. Airdrop and bountyYou probably don't need to spend much money (except for gas fees) to earn money through this method, but you do need time, skills, and patience. There are many tasks that you can do here, like content creation, social media promotion, translation, signature campaigns, and many others.2. StakingMany cryptocurrencies offer staking, where you can lock up your funds in a wallet or on a platform to support the network's operations and earn rewards in return. You can get stable coins, other coins or tokens, or even the platform's native tokens themselves when you stake.3. MiningIf you have the technical knowledge and resources, you can participate in cryptocurrency mining to earn rewards for validating transactions and securing the network. However, mining can be resource-intensive and may require specialised equipment.4. NFTsYou can make and trade unique digital assets like art, collectibles, or virtual land to potentially earn profits from their appreciation or through royalties. You probably need to join communities too, so you can have more success in NFTs.5. Become a developerI think this is the biggest challenge with the biggest profit if you succeed in mastering the skills of how to be a developer. There are many projects that need people to become their backend developers.I believe there are still many opportunities out there that haven't been mentioned here. It's just things that I know are common in the crypto world. I hope it can help.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: justinlamode on May 16, 2023, 10:54:34 AMNevertheless, I believe there should be more ways one can find opportunities of making money from blockchain technology in general; this is the reason for this thread. Kindly, give recommendations as to how one or what one can do to make income (passive or active) from cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Have you tried getting a skill that's relatable to cryptocurency or blockchain in general. One of the best ways to benefit from the industry is to offer a service that you'll receive payment in Bitcoin or other tradable cryptocurency of your choice. With your skills or the service that you'll be offering, you can make both passive and active income. Let use the forum as an example, you can offer your service in the forum and get patronage both on and off the forum. If you're a designer, you can launch your ANN on the forum and start getting job offers. If you're good with community management, you can do the same and get patronized as well.If you want to go bigger then you can take a course on blockchain and acquire a skills that you'll get paid for. There are so many projects looking for skillful people to hire to bring the best marketing to their project. You can spend some months to learn this skills and start been paid for it until you want to stop working for others and maybe develop your own app or projects for the market. Don't just depend on trading, mining or investing. Think bigger by equipping yourself with the necessary skills needed to take advantage of opportunities when they present themselves.
